name: Scratch Cat's Trip
description:
Scratch Cat goes on a trip, nothing can go wrong  ,right?

WRONG!

Because you, the player, has a plan to completely ruin it.

Based on an old scratch project I once had.

Not on development since a sequel is being released.

Secondary Download

If you can't download the game for some reason, you can download it from here:

Download

Secondary downloads currently only for Windows. Mac and Linux versions are in development.
